comments:
Hi,

I get a strange error message with 3.2RC7: I wonder where the strange string "I HATE YOU" comes from. I am using CVSNT 2.5.03 Build 2260.



org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.CVSCommunicationException: Could not connect to :pserver:scharf@localhost:/Repositry: I/O exception occurred: Connection refused: fork protocol library is missing entry pointI HATE YOU

The "I HATE YOU" message comes from CVSNT.....
It wouldn't come from us. We love everybody.

Funnily, depending on the login success it replies "I HATE YOU" or "I LOVE YOU" :-) It was a setup problem. I had to fully deinstall NTCVS are reinstall it -- that fixed the problem.

I also had to change the username in the CVS Repository properties to something invalid and back to the real username to get it to work. Before doing that, eclipse asked all the time for the password -- it seemed not to take my password.
